title: What would each BTS member’s Quora home page look like? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kim Namjoon Profile Pic:  Credentials: Leader of BTS Bio: He/Him Love Yourself, Speak Yourself Dynamite out now: *insert link* Type of answers: Life advice and BTS’ current promotions. Name of his space: Namjoon’s thoughts. Friends with: Aurora Zhang and Jo Sosna.  Kim Seokjin Profile pic:  Credentials: Worldwide Handsome Bio: You clicked on my account because of my profile picture, didn’t you?😉 Type of answers: Troll answers and corny jokes. Name of his space: Jin’s Moon Friends with: Miri Baldi and Dasha Yu.  Min Yoongi Profile Pic:  Credentials: Just trying to get through life Bio: Stop writing Lil Meow Meow in the comments of my answers. Btw, stream D-2: *insert link* Type of answers: One-sentence answers with dry humor and sarcasm (but get hundreds of upvotes). Name of space: Min Suga’s World. Friends with: Lindsey Marie and Michelle Tan.  Jung Hoseok  Credentials: Go stream Dynamite! 😁 Bio: Hello, AMI! I’m your hope, you’re my hope, I’m J-Hope! Type of answers: Upbeat life advice and he would insert lots of emojis in his answers lol. Name of his space: Hope World. Friends with: Neona Lay and Mae Green.  Park Jimin Profile pic:  Credentials: Mochi of Quora Bio: *insert pretty aesthetics that some K-Quorans have* Type of answers: Cute aesthetic answers with all the ❃✰♡⇨☾⌀♘♔. Name of space: Jiminie’s Serendipity Space Friends with: Me(:D) and Duaa Alle  Kim Taehyung Profile Pic:  Credentials: Vincent Van Gogh Bio: “A beautiful body perishes, but a work of art dies not” -Leonardo Da Vinci Soulmates with Park Jimin (BTS Member). Type of answers: Random-ass answers that make sense to literally no one except him but everyone upvotes anyways. Name of his space: Taetae Land Friends with: Tara Jane and Kathena Ronaldo  Jeon Jungkook Profile pic:  Credentials: I’m cuter than you Bio: Let’s get it! Type of answers: Memes and embarrassing pictures of the members. Name of space: Kookie’s Euphoria Land Friends with: Surabhi Mazumdar and Imoni Rose.  This was supposed to be a cute answer if Bangtan were K-Quorans (imagine if there actually is an idol secretly hiding as a K-Quoran right here I-) :)
